title: IIrik11
author: IIrik11
content: because im pretty sure that it is not news what's being spammed there..more like new projects promotion:i wonder if u should join adlunam..i don't know what it is but im getting fomo

comments.author: amishmanish
comments.body: LOL yeah..Sagarbansal21 needs to get a life if he is actually 21.But you are right. This sub is missing a moderator since the great Benson Samuel decided to launch his own crypto startup and disappear from the forum. It is at least good to know that India was important enough in the forum to have a sub of its own. Can't say that we did a great job with it. If this has a moderator and @Theymos was around to fix things, could have been a different story. I am not updated on the latest yet as I have been away from the forum for sometime.

comments.author: pakhitheboss
comments.body: No, we don't have any moderator. Please refer to the below quoted reply by Heisenberg_HunterQuote@eaLiTy was the most active member in trashing/reporting spams and if they are still active, we can make him a moderator but theymos would request for sufficient activity in our board before appointing anyone to the role.

comments.author: IIrik11
comments.body: Quote from: amishmanish on April 19, 2023, 06:48:41 AMLOL yeah..Sagarbansal21 needs to get a life if he is actually 21.But you are right. This sub is missing a moderator since the great Benson Samuel decided to launch his own crypto startup and disappear from the forum. It is at least good to know that India was important enough in the forum to have a sub of its own. Can't say that we did a great job with it. If this has a moderator and @Theymos was around to fix things, could have been a different story. I am not updated on the latest yet as I have been away from the forum for sometime.yeah..it didn't grow as much as they think it would i guess.but then the rules and laws changed and people went into hiding.nobody even thinks of trading on the forum now for they don't want to reveal their own identity.which is fair enough because u never know who is who.and i saw similar situations in exchanges as well.instead of having more and more traders as the time passed by they actually decreased.now even if ur neighbor is trading in bitcoin, s/he won't tell u about it.
